Posts.EditableText: Greetings. Old school Dungeon Master and autism parent. I got permission from Admin to share this here. Just want to share a game I coded for anyone to play. Its not only reading and making some choices - you dictate how the story turns out. **Ruler of Kings is a Text Browser game that recreates life in a medieval fantasy world**. It is as *detailed as a table top game* yet easy to play. Very similar to a MUD but more visual and not linear as you can go anywhere in the world. You can play as a good or evil character. Posts.HTML:
Greetings. Old school Dungeon Master and autism parent. I got permission from Admin to share this here. Just want to share a game I coded for anyone to play. Its not only reading and making some choices - you dictate how the story turns out.

Ruler of Kings is a Text Browser game that recreates life in a medieval fantasy world. It is as detailed as a table top game yet easy to play.

Very similar to a MUD but more visual and not linear as you can go anywhere in the world. You can play as a good or evil character. Stay PG or go into more adult content. Play at anytime and experience intensive character creation while establishing your own novel.

Play or read more at: Ruler Of Kings II Text Adventure
